you can assign multiple blockchain addresses to one virtual account when you have multiple blockchain addresses assigned to the same virtual account you aggregate various blockchain transactions from different addresses under a single accountyou can deposit funds from another blockchain address to a deposit address associated with the virtual account and the funds will be credited to that virtual account
